column2: "Na owiee ne nsɛm no nyina ka wɔ nkorɔfo no asomu no
column3: ɔkɛhɛɛn Karpernaum."

column2: "Nna asogyafo do ɔhamupanyin bi n'akowaa a ɔsom no bo kɛse yar ma ɔreyɛ ewu."
"Na ɔtsee Jesus ne nka no
column3: ɔsomaa Jewfo mpanyin bi wɔ no hɔ kɛserɛɛ no dɛ ɔmbra mbɛgye n'akowaa no nkwa."

column2: "Na wɔbaa Jesus nkyɛn no wɔserɛɛ no enyiberdo see dɛ
column3: Ɔsɛ dɛ ebɛyɛ dɛm adze yi ma no:"

column2: "osiandɛ ɔdɔ hɛn man
column3: na ɔnoara na osii hɛn nhyiamudan yi."

column2: "Na Jesus nye hɔn kɔree. Na ɔrebɛn fie no ho no
column3: ɔhamupanyin no somaa n'anyɛnkofo bi wɔ no hɔ kɛsee no dɛ
column5: mma nnhaw woho: na mennsɛ dɛ ebɛhɛn me hatsɛw ase;"

column2: "iyi ntsi na memmbu moho dɛ mesɛ dɛ meba wo nkyɛn no; dɛm ntsi ɔwo kasa ara
column3: na m'akowaa no bɛtse apɔw."

column2: "Na mo so meyɛ nyimpa a wɔdze me ahyɛ tum ase
column3: na mowɔ nsordaafo wɔ m'ase

column2: "Na Jesus tsee yinom no
column3: no ho yɛɛ no nwanwa
column4: na ɔsee nyimpadodow a wodzi n'ekyir no dɛ
column6: Israel mu mpo munnhun gyedzi a ɔtse dɛm yi bi pɛn."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔsomaa hɔn no sanee kɔr fie kohun akowaa no dɛ no ho ayɛ no dzen."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ annkyɛr biara na ɔkɔr kurow bi a wɔfrɛ no Nain mu; na n'esuafo no nye nyimpadodow pii nye no kɔree."
"Na ɔbɛɛn kurow no n'abobow ekyir no
column3: nna wɔso bi a oewu a ɔyɛ ne na ne ba kortsee
column5: na ɔbaa no yɛ okunafo; na nyimpadodow pii fi kurow no mu ka no ho."

column2: "Na Ewuradze hun basia no
column3: ne yamu hyehyee no maa no

column2: "Na ɔdze ne nsa kɛkaa fundaka no
column3: na hɔn a wɔso no no gyinae; Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na nyia oewu no soɛree
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ ase kasae. Na ɔdze no hyɛɛ ne na nsa."

column2: "Na hu kaa hɔn nyina; na wɔhyɛɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam see dɛ
column3: Nkɔnhyɛnyi kɛse asoɛr wɔ hɛn mu

column2: "Na no ho asɛm tahyee Judea nyina
column3: nye asaase a etwa ho ehyia nyina mu."

column2: "Na John n'esuafo kɛkaa yinom nyina ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no."
"Na John frɛɛ n'esuafo mu beenu
column3: na ɔsomaa hɔn Ewuradze hɔ kebisaa no dɛ
column4: Ana ɔwo nye nyia ɔreba no

column2: "Na mbarimba no baa ne nkyɛn no
column3: wɔsee dɛ
column4: John Onumanyi no asoma hɛn wo hɔ dɛ
column5: Ana ɔwo nye nyia ɔreba no

column2: "Na dɔnhwer kor no ara mu ɔsaa dodowara hɔn nyarba
column3: na oyii hɔn haw nye esunsum fi fii hɔn do
column4: na ɔmaa enyifurafo pii hun adze."

column2: "Na obuaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ nkɛka dza hom ehu na hom atse yi nkyerɛ John

column2: "Na nyia mennkɛyɛ no fintsidua no
column3: nhyira aka no."

column2: "Na John n'abɔfoe no kɔree no
column3: ɔhyɛɛ ase bisaa nyimpadodow no wɔ John ho dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na hom kɔr sar no do kɔhwɛe? Ndzɛmbir a mframa rihim no a?"

column2: "Na ebɛnadze na hom puei kɔhwɛe? Nyimpa a ofura tam papa a? Hwɛ
column3: hɔn a wofura atam hyerɛpɛɛ

column2: "Na ebɛnadze na hom puei kɔhwɛe? Nkɔnhyɛnyi a? Nyew
column3: mese hom dɛ

column2: "Oyi nye nyia wɔakyerɛw no ho dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: morosoma mo bɔfoe ma oeedzi w'enyim kan a Obesiesie wo kwan edzi w'enyim."

column2: "Mese hom dɛ
column3: hɔn a mbaa awo hɔn nyina mu biara mmpuei a ɔyɛ kɛse kyɛn John: naaso nyia ɔyɛ aketseaba koraa wɔ sor ahenman no mu no yɛ kɛse kyɛn no."

column2: "(Na nkorɔfo a wɔtsee nyina nye atowgyefo no
column3: gyee Nyankopɔn no ndwuma no too mu na wɔdze John n'enuma no numaa hɔn."

column2: "Naaso Farisiifo nye mbrakyerɛfo no dze
column3: wɔpoow Nyankopɔn n'apam maa hɔnho

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔsee dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na medze ndɛ mber yi mu nyimpa bɔto ho

column2: "Wɔtse dɛ mbofraba a wɔtsenatsena gua do
column3: na wɔrefrɛfrɛ hɔnho se dɛ
column5: na hom annsaw; yeetwa ewuo na hom ennsu."

column2: "John Onumanyi no aba
column3: onndzidzi

column2: "Nyimpa Ba no aba
column3: odzidzi na ɔnom

column2: "Naaso nyansa ne mba bu no bem."
"Na Farisiifo no mu kor serɛɛ no dɛ ɔnye no nkedzidzi
column3: na ɔkɔr Farisiinyi no ne fie kɛtsenaa edziban ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa bi a ɔwɔ kurow no mu a ɔyɛ dzebɔnyɛnyi; tsee dɛ oridzidzi wɔ Farisiinyi no ne fie no
column3: ɔdze ngohuam alabasta toaba ma bae

column2: "na obegyinaa n'ekyir wɔ n'anan ho sui
column3: na ɔhyɛɛ ase dze ne nyinsuwa fɔɔw n'anan ho

column2: "Na Farisiinyi a ohyiaa no edzidzi no hunii no
column3: ɔkae wɔ ne tsirmu dɛ
column6: anaa ɔbaa kor a ɔdze ne nsa aka no yi

column2: "Na Jesus buae see no dɛ
column3: Simon
column4: mowɔ asɛm bi ka kyerɛ wo.  Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Bosabɔnyi bi wɔ akafo beenu: baako dze sika denare ahaenum
column3: baako so dze eduonum."

column2: "Na wonnya bi nntua no
column3: ɔdze kyɛɛ hɔn beenu nyina kwa. Dɛm ntsi hɔn mu woana bɔdɔ no dodow?"

column2: "Simon buae see dɛ
column3: Mususu dɛ
column4: nyia ɔdze dodow kyɛɛ no no a. Na ɔsee no dɛ

column2: "Na ɔdaan n'enyiwa wɔ ɔbaa no do see Simon dɛ
column3: Ehu ɔbaa yi? Mebaa wo fie no
column4: ɔwo amma me me nan ho nsu; naaso ɔnodze
column5: ɔdze ne nyinsuwa afɔw me nan ho

column2: "Ɔwo ammfew m'ano
column3: naaso ɔno dze

column2: "Ɔwo ammfa ngo annsera me tsirmu
column3: naaso ɔno dze
column4: ɔdze ngohuam asera me nan ho mpo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mese wo dɛ no bɔn a ɔdɔɔ so no
column3: wɔdze akyɛ no
column4: osiandɛ no dɔ dɔɔ so; na nyia wɔdze kumaabi akyɛ no

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Wɔdze wo bɔn akyɛ wo."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔnye no tse edzidzi no hyɛɛ ase kae wɔ hɔn mu dɛ
column3: Woana nye oyi a ɔdze bɔn so kyɛ yi?"

column2: "Na ɔsee ɔbaa no dɛ
column3: Wo gyedzi agye wo: kɔ asomdwee mu."
